entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11 except 7 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 11 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1 except minus 3 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 1 except minus 3 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
